card.name: "Doomsday Calendar"
card.text: Whenever one or more permanents become untapped during your untap step, put that many time counters on "Doomsday Calendar". {2}, {T}: Double the amount of time counters on "Doomsday Calendar". When there are 1,000 or more time counters on "Doomsday Calendar", sacrifice it and each opponent loses 1,000 life.

card.name: "Explorer's Stash"
card.text: "Explorer's Stash" enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, put a +1/+1 counter on "Explorer's Stash". {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from "Explorer's Stash" to target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: "Fracturing Mage"
card.text: Artifacts your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped. {X}{X}{W}, Sacrifice "Fracturing Mage": Destroy each artifact with converted mana cost X.

card.name: "Goldfury Strider"
card.text: Trample Tap two untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: "Headlong Bonkasaurus"

card.name: Sinuous Benthisaur
card.text: When Sinuous Benthisaur enters the battlefield, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of Caves you control plus the number of Cave cards in your graveyard. Put two of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
